alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 5:55PM CDT until November 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL HENDERSON COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Athens, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Henderson County, including the following locations... Murchison, Crescent Heights and Walton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
